snippet.title: Aliens Fireteam Elite: Pathogen - Official World Premiere Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2022
snippet.description:
Check out the story trailer for the upcoming 'Pathogen' expansion to Aliens: Fireteam Elite. The DLC includes new missions, weapons, outfits, gear mods, and more. The trailer also introduces the Aliens: Fireteam Elite Hardcore mode, which adds an even-deadlier challenge mode to the PvE action.

#IGN #IGNSummerofGaming
